actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the income eligibility limit for medical assistance for COBRA continuation coverage under a State medicaid plan from 100 percent to 185 percent of the poverty level.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to increase the income eligibility limit for COBRA continuation coverage under a State Medicaid plan.

titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to increase the income eligibility limit for medical assistance for COBRA continuation coverage under a State medicaid plan from 100 percent to 185 percent of the poverty level.
